TopicTitle: Waiter, theres a _____________ in my soup!

Articles.Content:
Yes, it is called dashi. It is a stock/broth made from small fish and it is traditionally added to miso soup.

Waiter! You did not give me rice with my Miyeok-Guk.

Edited August 23, 2023 by TwoCalories
I felt a great disturbance in the Force, as if millions of voices suddenly cried out "New page," and were suddenly silenced.

Yes, thats because you had the rice and forgot.

waiter! Theres diced carrots, diced potatoes, beef chunks, diced onions, diced tomatoes, beef broth, salt and pepper in my vegetable beef soup.

190908232023

Sorry sir, that's the wrong menu option. Here, have your vegetable-beef soup! It's made with plant-based meat and plant-based meat stock instead of regular meat.

Waiter! There's a waiter in my soup!

Thats because its waiter soup!

waiter! There is vegan options in my obligate carnivore soup!

204008232023

Never sir. Every table and chair is covered in leather. There is no way a Vegan would eat here.

Waiter, why has the toast raft in my soup got no butterfly?

Well sir, the butter melted then it chose to fly away.

waiter! Why is there a waiter wading in my soup?

030408302023

Because that is Wade Wilson. Your soup is a dead pool.

Waiter, is that a hot rock in my soup?

Ah, cold rock soup. High in minerals!

waiter! Theres no food in my soup, why?

080008302023

It's a space soup. No food in space.

Waiter! Which part of Coca-Cola is not a drug name?

Coke isn't a drink...

Waiter, there is a country's border in my soup!

Yes, it's a border between two spots of mildew. You should eat it a week ago.

Waiter! Where is the Shift in this alphabet soup?

It is a shift worker and this is the wrong time of day.

Waiter, this lego bowl is leaking.

Because you did not use the cragle

waiter! My soup is getting twitchy

012909022023

It's cursed by T-witch.

Waiter! Math soup, please. With integrals and nablas.

Here's your number soup. For a fun game, add up all the numbers in the soup.

Waiter, there's gumbo in my stew in my bisque in my soup in my broth in my bouillon in my liquid in my water!

Edited September 4, 2023 by TwoCalories
spellanz

Sorry, that was as close as we could get to Turducken.

Waiter. I feel this soup is missing something.

Sorry thats because we ran out of soup so your soup is missing itself.

waiter! Theres revenge in my soup

021009042023

You took our cooks parking spot, so.

The duck in my soup seems very comfortable.

Duck and cover, that's our recipe.

Waiter! Is this a rabbit or a hare steak?

Its a rabbit hare cake.

waiter! There is a flambé in my soup!

124009042023

Please do not drink the alcohol while we flambé this dish.

Waiter, there's cream in my cream soup!

You have cream cheese soup!

waiter! Why is there a ninja in my nachos?

144109042023

We only serve the freshest food at our restaurant.

Waiter! Where do you buy tomatobasil to put in the tomato basil soup? (That is spelled correctly)

Edited September 4, 2023 by TwoCalories

Have to ask Basil, he buys all the tomatoes.

Waiter, is this soup in a cup?

Yes, it's a Champignonship Soup.

Waiter! A reversed chirality soup, please. I'm on diet.
